page.title: 06MEDIA
page.content: Of the four main radio stations operated by the BBC Radio 1,which broadcasts pop music with hourly news bulletins is the most popular with young people in the area.In many houses a{radio}can be heard during the day providing background noise. Many people watch{television}during the day. It provides company in particular for the lonely or housebound people.Many more people watch television in the evenings. We surveyed the 63 children in our school.Their favourite{programme}types were: Soap opera 21 Serials 20 Films 7 Cartoons 6 Comedies 6 Sport 2 Pop 1 Overall the three favourite programmes were Dallas,Dynasty and Cats Eyes.
